titleStmt.title: Peri ydroposias: or, a discourse of waters their qualities, and effects diæteticall, pathologicall, and pharmacaiticall. By Tobias Whitaker, doctor in physicke of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Whitaker, Tobias, d. 1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by A. Mathewes] for Iohn Grismond, at the signe of the Gunne in Ivie-Lane,

notesStmt.note: The first two words of the title are in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago, Chicago, Ill.

place.placeName: the signe of the Gunne in Ivie-Lane
